column2: I am always on the lookout for a good Spanish restaurant.  I've been coming to Babareeba for years
column3: and the reason I keep coming back is because this is far and away the best paella I've had outside of Spain.  The paella valenciana is a good choice if you're new to it
column4: but all of their options are delicious.  I judge every place claiming to be a tapas restaurant by their patatas bravas (spicy potatoes)
column5: and Babareeba's are among the best I've ever had. Their dates wrapped in bacon
column8: and tortilla espanola are all amazing also.  The red sangria is great
column9: and a few pitchers for a group are always a good way to start of an entertaining night.
